  • Non medical nutrition advice

    Taking a holistic approach to your diet and lifestyle. We would advise 4 x 30 minutes (£60 total) sessions to fully address your diet and lifestyle issues. The client keeps a food diary, we analyse this together and create a healthy eating and lifestyle plan to address the individual's issues and give them a jump start towards better health.

  • Holistic Facial

This deeply relaxing treatment includes cleanse, tone and mask � finishing with a hand, shoulder, neck and face massage.

  • Onsite Chair Massage

    Available for workplaces and events. Chair massage focuses on the key areas of tension, the head, neck and shoulders. Perfect for the workplace, this quick and to-the-point treatment includes pressure techniques and is performed over clothes. Leaving you refreshed and energised. Get a quote

    (1hr) £30
